value:
Proof that two Heroes bested a boss
on their journeys together. Serves as
a souvenir from their travels.

A whistle from Shez, used to notify
fellow mercenaries of one's position.
Also used as a good-luck charm.

A whistle from Shez, used to notify
fellow mercenaries of one's position.
Blow it, and he may come running!

A whistle from Shez, used to notify
fellow mercenaries of one's position.
Also used as a good-luck charm.

A whistle from Shez, used to notify
fellow mercenaries of one's position.
Blow it, and she may come running!

A portable tea set from Monica.
Wouldn't it be nice to go for a long
ride and have a cup of tea sometime?

A portable tea set from Monica.
Includes the full selection of the
emperor's favorite teas.

A small bottle from Hilda filled with
flowers that have been hardened
with resin so they will never wilt.

A small bottle from Hilda filled with
flowers and decorated by a girl with
an eye for detail and a love of fashion!

Finish all turns to complete a game of Pawns
of Loki.

Defeat a foe with the My Summoner unit
in Mjölnir's Strike.

Defeat a foe with the My Summoner unit
in Mjölnir's Strike.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.

Clear Extra Stage 2 in Tap Battle. (Extra Stage
2 is playable after it unlocks.)

Clear Extra Stage 3 in Tap Battle. (Extra Stage
3 is playable after it unlocks.)
Defeat a flying foe that is level 20 or higher.

Defeat a flying foe that is level 20 or higher
with a sword ally.

Defeat a flying foe that is level 20 or higher
with a lance ally.

Defeat a flying foe that is level 20 or higher
with an axe ally.

Defeat a flying foe that is level 20 or higher
with a colorless bow ally.

Defeat a flying foe that is level 20 or higher
with an infantry ally.

Defeat a flying foe that is level 20 or higher
with an armored ally.
Defeat a flying foe that is level 30 or higher.

Defeat a flying foe that is level 30 or higher
with a red tome ally.

Defeat a flying foe that is level 30 or higher
with a blue tome ally.

Defeat a flying foe that is level 30 or higher
with a green tome ally.

Defeat a flying foe that is level 30 or higher
with a colorless dagger ally.

Defeat a flying foe that is level 30 or higher
with a cavalry ally.

Defeat a flying foe that is level 30 or higher
with a flying ally.
Defeat a flying foe that is level 40 or higher.

Clear Book III, Chapter 1: Part 3 with Anna:
Commander on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 6: Part 5 with Anna:
Commander on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 7: Part 3 with Anna:
Commander on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 7: Part 5 with Anna:
Commander on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 8: Part 1 with Sharena:
Princess of Askr on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 8: Part 3 with Sharena:
Princess of Askr on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 8: Part 5 with Sharena:
Princess of Askr on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 9: Part 5 with Sharena:
Princess of Askr on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 11: Part 1 with Sharena:
Princess of Askr on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 11: Part 5 with Sharena:
Princess of Askr on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 12: Part 1 with Sharena:
Princess of Askr on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 12: Part 5 with Alfonse:
Prince of Askr on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 13: Part 5 with Alfonse:
Prince of Askr on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.)

Clear Book VI, Chapter 11: Part 1 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book VI, Chapter 11: Part 2 on Lunatic
difficulty with a lance ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book VI, Chapter 11: Part 3 on Lunatic
difficulty with an axe ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book VI, Chapter 11: Part 4 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book VI, Chapter 11: Part 5 on Lunatic
difficulty with a lance ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Former member of the Order of Heroes and
friend to Prince Alfonse. Member of the Emblian
royal family, and Veronica's elder brother.

A mercenary who wandered Fódlan. Though
ordinarily rational, a burning desire sleeps
within him. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors:
Three Hopes.

A mercenary who wandered Fódlan. Though
ordinarily rational, a burning desire sleeps
within her. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors:
Three Hopes.

Noble of the Adrestian Empire and daughter
of Baron Ochs. Endlessly faithful to Edelgard.
Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

Noble of the Leicester Alliance and son of
House Goneril. Unmatched in combat, but still
prone to doting on his sister, Hilda. Appears
in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

Noble of the Leicester Alliance and daughter of
House Goneril. Despite lacking enthusiasm for
work, she is willing to lend her aid...sometimes.
Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

Swordsman of the realm of the dead, now
wielding a weapon imbued with magic, having
made a contract with the god Thórr.

His arcane weapon can guarantee
a follow-up, block foe follow-ups, and
slow his foe's Special trigger.

Her weapon boosts toughness for
both her and nearby allies, and raises
Special damage based on Spd!

Can attack up to four times, reduce
damage by 40% on foes' first attacks,
while moving allies and blocking foes.

Inflicts a penalty on her foe's Spd/Res
based on their max Special cooldown
count value—plus strong follow-ups!

Grants Atk+3. At start of combat, if unit's
HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to
unit during combat, grants bonus to
Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current
bonus on each of unit's stats (calculates each
stat bonus independently), and inflicts Special
cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only
highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Grants Spd+5. Inflicts Def/Res-5. Unit attacks
twice. At start of combat, the following effects
will occur based on unit's HP: if ≥ 20%, grants
Special cooldown charge +1 to unit per attack
(only highest value applied; does not stack),
and also, if ≥ 40%, reduces damage from foe's
first attack during combat by 40%.

Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if foe's
HP ≥ 75%, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during
combat and the following effects will occur
based on unit's HP at start of combat: if ≥ 20%,
grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit per
attack (only highest value applied; does not
stack), and also, if ≥ 40%, reduces damage
from foe's first attack during combat by 40%.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat for allies within 2 spaces
of unit, if the ally has Def > unit's Def or if unit
has not entered combat during the current
phase, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 and "reduces
damage from foe's first attack by 20%" to
those allies during combat. At start of unit's
combat, if unit is not within 2 spaces of any
allies with Def > unit's Def or if unit is not
adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit
during combat, reduces damage from foe's
first attack by 40% during combat, and deals
damage = X% of unit's Spd when Special
triggers (X = unit's max Special cooldown
count value × 10, + 20; excludes area-of-effect
Specials).

$aAccelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants
Atk/Spd+6 and【Desperation】to unit for 1 turn.
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants
Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat and
inflicts penalty on foe's Spd/Res during
combat = 11 - foe's max Special cooldown
count value × 2. (Minimum penalty of 3. If foe
does not have a Special skill, penalty = 3.)

【Desperation】
Grants the following effect for 1 turn: "If unit
initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up
attack before foe can counterattack."

If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to
a different space, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Def
during combat = X + 1. (X = number of spaces
from start position to end position of whoever
initiated combat; max 1.)

If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to
a different space, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Def
during combat = X + 3. (X = number of spaces
from start position to end position of whoever
initiated combat; max 2.)

If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to
a different space, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Def
during combat = X + 5. (X = number of spaces
from start position to end position of whoever
initiated combat; max 3.)

If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to
a different space, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Def
during combat = X + 6. (X = number of spaces
from start position to end position of whoever
initiated combat; max 4.) If X ≥ 2, neutralizes
unit's penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 2 (max 20%). Neutralizes effects that
inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit.

If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 3 (max 30%). Neutralizes effects that
inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit.

If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 4 (max 40%). Neutralizes effects that
inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit.

Inflicts Spd/Res-1 on foe and neutralizes effects
that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe
or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit
during combat.

Inflicts Spd/Res-2 on foe and neutralizes effects
that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe
or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit
during combat.

Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe and neutralizes effects
that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe
or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit
during combat.

Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through
spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with
Range = 2 cannot move through spaces
within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect
foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Spd/Def-2 on
foe during combat. Restores 3 HP to unit
after combat.

Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through
spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with
Range = 2 cannot move through spaces
within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect
foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on
foe during combat. Restores 5 HP to unit
after combat.

Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through
spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with
Range = 2 cannot move through spaces
within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect
foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on
foe during combat. Restores 7 HP to unit
after combat.
